dn20:2.1: The Pure Abodes are inhabited entirely by non-returners.
dn20:3.15: A village ([pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:3.8]]()) or royal compound ([pli-tv-bu-vb-pc83:1.3.56.1]()) was marked with a “boundary post” (_indakhīla_). It symbolized a fixed and immovable point, either in a good sense ([sn56.39:4.1]()) or, as here, and obstacle.
dn20:3.22: The discourse up to here is also found at [sn1.37]().
